comments.body: These 2 changes to themes.dart should be in a separate PR.

These two small changes fix one of the breaking tests. If you put the app to dark mode without these changes you will notice that the contrast is too little. So yeah, it would make sense to add these changes in a different PR
I assume that what you mean is that one of the gallery slider tests fails without these changes? If that's true, then it seems OK to leave them as part of this PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@    brightness: Brightness.dark,
    accentColorBrightness: Brightness.dark,
    colorScheme: colorScheme,
    primaryColor: primaryColor,
    primaryColorDark: const Color(0xFF0050a0),
